wf_workflow_version.description: This is the workflow used to execute terminations of technical products
wf_workflow_version.name: Terminate technical product flow
wf_workflow_version.on_cancel: // This script executes if the workflow is cancelled.// The global variable context_sys_id contains the sys_id of the cancelled workflow context.

wf_workflow.description: This is the workflow used to execute terminations of technical products
wf_workflow.name: Terminate technical product flow

wf_activity.name: Core Solution provides more information for termination

sys_variable_value.value: // Set 'answer' to the number of seconds this timer should wait answer = 0;
Please provide additional information needed by implmentation in order to terminate technical product(s)
Please provide additional information needed by implmentation in order to terminate technical product(s)

wf_activity.name: Notify CoE group about pending task

sys_variable_value.value:
Dear CoE
There is a pending task for your Group. Please assign the task to an individual CoE responsible for terminating the products for the customer
// Set the variable 'answer' to a comma-separated list of user or group sys_ids that you want the email sent to.

Dear CoE
There is a pending task for your Group. Please assign the task to an individual CoE responsible for terminating the products for the customer
// Set the variable 'answer' to a comma-separated list of user or group sys_ids that you want the email sent to.

Thank you!
